content: be hidden under the wig 13 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs the chain and keeping the right side of the crochet work up bangs x 4 crochet hook 2 0 mm work as tight as the head work yu start with mustard you ll also need blue r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r2 6 increase 12 r3 12 single_crochet 12 turn r4 4 single_crochet you don t complete the round 4 fasten_off and hide all the tails left cy-po make 4 using blue yarn work sew or glue this piece onto the head chain 2 6 single_crochet all in 2nd loop from hook chain 8 then proceed working4 scin each of the bangs pieces end with chain 10 6 single_crochet in 2nd loop from hook i glued the earcups those are headphones right it was the first silent party in history and the base of the bangs along r4 of the bangs workslall the way back to the beginning the stitches should be visible from the top which means they must be worked in the upper loops of 14 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs row8 1 decrease 9 single_crochet 1 decrease 11 tch turn row9 3 single_crochet 5 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 11 tch turn chignon row10 1 decrease 1 single_crochet 5 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 9 tch turn crochet hook 2 0 mm row11 1 decrease 5 half_double_crochet 1 decrease 7 work as tight as the head cy-po work yu work with mustard r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r2 6 increase 12 r3 12 single_crochet 12 cy-poafter the first 2 leave long tails don t cy-poafter the 3rd one make 3 using the tails left sew closed the 2 lower parts keep working from where you left off on the 3rd piece work r4 4 scin the 3rd 12 scall around another and then sew the top one to these lower 2 8 scin the one left skip 4on the 3rd from where you left off and work 4 scin the 3rd 28 stuff a bit r1-r3 of each piece keep working all around this piece r5 20 single_crochet 1 sl you don t complete the round 21 no tch turn from now on work in row row6 skip the sl 3 single_crochet 3 decrease blo 2 single_crochet 3 decrease blo 3 single_crochet 1 sl 15 no tch turn row7 skip the sl 12 single_crochet 1 decrease 13 tch turn 15 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs sew or glue this piece on top of the head it should overlap a bit with her headphones congratulations your cinderella is ready don t forget to send me a picture and tag me / give me credits / use my hashtag when posting online all info is in the license 16
